sqlMap.select: select id, name, parent_id, seq, level, descn, sys_connect_by_path(id, '//') as id_path, sys_connect_by_path(name, '//') as name_path from sm_category start with parent_id is null connect by prior id = parent_id order siblings by seq, name

select id, name, parent_id, seq, level, descn, sys_connect_by_path(id, '//') as id_path, sys_connect_by_path(name, '//') as name_path from sm_category start with parent_id = #value# connect by prior id = parent_id order siblings by seq, name

select id, name, parent_id, seq, level, descn, sys_connect_by_path(id, '//') as id_path, sys_connect_by_path(name, '//') as name_path from sm_category start with id = #value# connect by prior parent_id = id order siblings by seq, name

select id, name, parent_id, seq, descn from sm_category where parent_id = (select parent_id from sm_category where id = #value#) union all select id, name, parent_id, seq, descn from sm_category where parent_id is null and exists (select name from sm_category where id = #value# and parent_id is null)
